TieflingMother.synopsis: A family of refugees plead for the Open Hand Temple to open its doors for them again. They rely on the charity of the church to survive and mourn the death of the Head Priest too. This is the tiefling mother's one-liner.
TieflingMother.how_to_trigger: - go to -10;47; -5- Talk to the tiefling mother of the Desperate Refugee vignette in front of the Open Hand Temple

AD_MotherPlea.synopsis: A family of refugees plead for the Open Hand Temple to open its doors for them again. They rely on the charity of the church to survive and mourn the death of the Head Priest too.
AD_MotherPlea.how_to_trigger: - go to -10;47; -5- Dialogue should start automatically when you get close enough to the vignette, next to the Open Hand Temple entrance.

TieflingBoy.synopsis: A family of refugees plead for the Open Hand Temple to open its doors for them again. They rely on the charity of the church to survive and mourn the death of the Head Priest too. This is the tiefling boy's one-liner.
TieflingBoy.how_to_trigger: - go to -10;47; -5- Talk to the tiefling boy of the Desperate Refugee vignette in front of the Open Hand Temple

TieflingFather.synopsis: A family of refugees plead for the Open Hand Temple to open its doors for them again. They rely on the charity of the church to survive and mourn the death of the Head Priest too. This is the tiefling dad's one-liner.
TieflingFather.how_to_trigger: - go to -10;47; -5- Talk to the tiefling father of the Desperate Refugee vignette in front of the Open Hand Temple

TieflingGirl.synopsis: A family of refugees plead for the Open Hand Temple to open its doors for them again. They rely on the charity of the church to survive and mourn the death of the Head Priest too. This is the tiefling girl's one-liner.
TieflingGirl.how_to_trigger: - go to -10;47; -5- Talk to the tiefling girl of the Desperate Refugee vignette in front of the Open Hand Temple

TieflingMother_0.speaker: Rozes Kallista
TieflingMother_0.text: The priests will open the temple up again, you'll see! They're good people - holy people.

TieflingMother_1.speaker: Rozes Kallista
TieflingMother_1.text: If you're hungry, you can wait with us. A priest might come out with some scraps if we're lucky.

AD_MotherPlea_0.speaker: Rozes Kallista
AD_MotherPlea_0.text: We loved Father Lorgan as you did, we would never hurt him!

AD_MotherPlea_2.speaker: Rozes Kallista
AD_MotherPlea_2.text: We had nothing to do with his death, we swear it.

AD_MotherPlea_1.speaker: Rozes Kallista
AD_MotherPlea_1.text: Please, in the name of the Crying One, have mercy.

AD_MotherPlea_3.speaker: Rozes Kallista
AD_MotherPlea_3.text: If you won't help us, at least let the children in - they've had nothing but scraps for days.

TieflingBoy_1.speaker: Iados Kallista
TieflingBoy_1.text: Can I please have some food - oh, sorry. I thought you were a priest.

TieflingFather_0.speaker: Leucis Kallista
TieflingFather_0.text: If you're looking for Ilmater's charity, you're out of luck. They've turned their backs on us - like everyone else.

TieflingFather_1.speaker: Leucis Kallista
TieflingFather_1.text: Watch your step inside the temple - one of their priests got cut to ribbons, and they're looking for someone to blame.

TieflingGirl_0.speaker: Nemi Kallista
TieflingGirl_0.text: Bet you won't get kicked out of the temple. They blame us for everything.

TieflingGirl_1.speaker: Nemi Kallista
TieflingGirl_1.text: Tell them that Father Lorgan was nice to us, and that we didn't do anything! We swear!
